name: Capyx
tagline: Captable management for private and public companies
description:
Captable management platform allowing private and public companies to manage their equity and handle all signatures/accounting requirements.

We built a rails application that featured an approve-accept process for equity, detailed reporting, and provided an auditable ASC 718 and ASC 505-50 report.

name: Shnack
tagline: Skip the line for food at concerts and stadiums
description:
An application that allows people to order food from their phone and skip the line at concerts and stadiums. We ultimately pivoted to focusing on coffee shops.

We built a web application, an iPhone application and an iPad application (which allowed restaurants to receive orders). Users would also be texted notifications as their order was being prepared and when it was ready.
accomplishments: Semi-Finalist at UCSB's New Venture Competition

name: SB Hacks
description: We organized UCSB's first annual hackathon with a team of 15 students, bringing in over 550+ attendees and raising over $90K in sponsorships.

name: Netbin
tagline: Command Line file-sharing utility over LAN.
description: Netbin is a utility that allows devices on the same subnet can upload and download files using the netbin client. We built the full utility in python, managing direct TCP and UDP connections between clients, and maintaining an IP table that keeps a list of all active clients and uploaded files.

name: Spritzify
tagline: Highlight any text on the web, right click, and Spritz!
description: We built a chrome extension and iOS app that allowed users to spritz various blocks of text anywhere on the web. Both of these apps would then send a message to our analytics backend (linked).
accomplishments: First Place at LA Hacks 2014 for the Spritz API Prize

name: WeWrite
description: We built a rails app that allowed people to write a story one line at a time. Users could branch stories at any point, follow stories and find people to collaborate with.
